-- Megatron --

Catching Hot Rod's words as Megatron continues rising up, wings 
flapping madly, "Nice? Nice and dead are two words Maximals should 
know abo--- grrr." He's cut off as Kup's magnetic grenade catches 
his tail and destroys the lower half of it. He swirves left and 
avoids Hot Rod's missiles, and flinches as one of Sunhawk's blasts 
puts a hole through his wing, though not damaging his flying ability.

Megatron turns his head downward, and ignites his fire breath. He 
sprays a layer of fire behind him in hopes of skewing the maximals' 
aim a little.
